INSERT INTO st_merchandise_external_warehouse
id , merchant_id , merchant_name , goods_no , barcode , goods_name , english_goods_name , hs_code , factory_no , brand_id , brand_name , source_goods_id , source , product_type_name0 , product_type_name , gross_weight , net_weight , spec , shelf_life_days , filing_price , unit , county_name , county_area , customs_area_id , manufacturer , manufacturer_addr , customs_goods_record_no , jinerxiang , unit_name_one , unit_name_two , sku_code , brand_type , material_account , sale_good_names , EMS_code , `describe` , declare_factor , component , box_to_unit , torr_to_unit , `length` , width , height , volume , pack_type , creater , create_name , create_date , modifier , modifiy_name , modify_date , customs_area_name , product_type_id0 , product_type_id , derp_goods_no , derp_merchandis_id ,

#{id} , #{merchantId} , #{merchantName} , #{goodsNo} , #{barcode} , #{goodsName} , #{englishGoodsName} , #{hsCode} , #{factoryNo} , #{brandId} , #{brandName} , #{sourceGoodsId} , #{source} , #{productTypeName0} , #{productTypeName} , #{grossWeight} , #{netWeight} , #{spec} , #{shelfLifeDays} , #{filingPrice} , #{unit} , #{countyName} , #{countyArea} , #{customsAreaId} , #{manufacturer} , #{manufacturerAddr} , #{customsGoodsRecordNo} , #{jinerxiang} , #{unitNameOne} , #{unitNameTwo} , #{skuCode} , #{brandType} , #{materialAccount} , #{saleGoodNames} , #{emsCode} , #{describe} , #{declareFactor} , #{component} , #{boxToUnit} , #{torrToUnit} , #{length} , #{width} , #{height} , #{volume} , #{packType} , #{creater} , #{createName} , #{createDate} , #{modifier} , #{modifiyName} , #{modifyDate} , #{customsAreaName} , #{productTypeId0} , #{productTypeId} , #{derpGoodsNo} , #{derpMerchandisId} ,

select t1.id,t1.merchant_name,t1.merchant_id,t1.goods_no,t1.barcode,t1.goods_name,t1.english_goods_name,t1.hs_code,t1.factory_no,t1.brand_id, t1.brand_name,t1.source_goods_id,t1.source,t1.product_type_name0, t1.product_type_name,t1.gross_weight, t1.net_weight,t1.spec,t1.shelf_life_days,t1.filing_price,t1.unit,t1.county_name,t1.county_area,t1.manufacturer,t1.manufacturer_addr,t1.customs_goods_record_no,t1.jinerxiang, t1.unit_name_one,t1.unit_name_two,t1.sku_code,t1.brand_type,t1.material_account,t1.sale_good_names,t1.EMS_code,t1.describe,t1.declare_factor, t1.component,t1.box_to_unit, t1.torr_to_unit,t1.length,t1.width,t1.height,t1.volume,t1.pack_type,t1.creater,t1.create_name,t1.create_date,t1.modify_date,t1.modifier,t1.modifiy_name, t1.create_date,t1.customs_area_name,t1.customs_area_id,t1.product_type_id0,t1.product_type_id from st_merchandise_external_warehouse t1
t1.id in
#{id}
t1.id= #{id} and t1.merchant_id= #{merchantId} and t1.merchant_name= #{merchantName} and t1.goods_no= #{goodsNo} and t1.barcode= #{barcode} and t1.goods_name= #{goodsName} and t1.english_goods_name= #{englishGoodsName} and t1.hs_code= #{hsCode} and t1.factory_no= #{factoryNo} and t1.brand_id= #{brandId} and t1.brand_name= #{brandName} and t1.source_goods_id= #{sourceGoodsId} and t1.source= #{source} and t1.product_type_name0= #{productTypeName0} and t1.product_type_name= #{productTypeName} and t1.gross_weight= #{grossWeight} and t1.net_weight= #{netWeight} and t1.spec= #{spec} and t1.shelf_life_days= #{shelfLifeDays} and t1.filing_price= #{filingPrice} and t1.unit= #{unit} and t1.county_name= #{countyName} and t1.county_area= #{countyArea} and t1.manufacturer= #{manufacturer} and t1.manufacturer_addr= #{manufacturerAddr} and t1.customs_goods_record_no= #{customsGoodsRecordNo} and t1.jinerxiang= #{jinerxiang} and t1.unit_name_one= #{unitNameOne} and t1.unit_name_two= #{unitNameTwo} and t1.sku_code= #{skuCode} and t1.brand_type= #{brandType} and t1.material_account= #{materialAccount} and t1.sale_good_names= #{saleGoodNames} and t1.EMS_code= #{emsCode} and t1.describe= #{describe} and t1.declare_factor= #{declareFactor} and t1.component= #{component} and t1.box_to_unit= #{boxToUnit} and t1.torr_to_unit= #{torrToUnit} and t1.length= #{length} and t1.width= #{width} and t1.height= #{height} and t1.volume= #{volume} and t1.pack_type= #{packType} and t1.customs_area_name like concat('%',#{customsAreaName},'%') and t1.customs_area_id= #{customsAreaId} and product_type_id0= #{productTypeId0} and product_type_id= #{productTypeId} and derp_goods_no= #{derpGoodsNo} and derp_merchandis_id= #{derpMerchandisId} and
order by t1.create_date DESC,t1.modify_date DESC

select t1.id,t1.merchant_name,t1.merchant_id,t1.goods_no,t1. barcode,t1.goods_name,t1.english_goods_name, t1.derp_goods_no, t1.derp_merchandis_id,t1.hs_code,t1.factory_no,t1.brand_id, t1.brand_name,t1.source_goods_id,t1.source,t1.product_type_name0, t1.product_type_name,t1.gross_weight, t1.net_weight,t1.spec,t1.shelf_life_days,t1.filing_price,t1.unit,t1.county_name,t1.county_area,t1.manufacturer,t1.manufacturer_addr,t1.customs_goods_record_no,t1.jinerxiang, t1.unit_name_one,t1.unit_name_two,t1.sku_code,t1.brand_type,t1.material_account,t1.sale_good_names,t1.EMS_code,t1.describe,t1.declare_factor, t1.component,t1.box_to_unit, t1.torr_to_unit,t1.length,t1.width,t1.height,t1.volume,t1.pack_type,t1.creater,t1.create_name,t1.create_date,t1.modify_date,t1.modifier,t1.modifiy_name, t1.create_date,t1.customs_area_name,t1.customs_area_id,t1.product_type_id0,t1.product_type_id from st_merchandise_external_warehouse t1 where t1.id=#{id}
